comments.body: reflect.DeepEqual w/ Config{} seems more maintianable?

It would have to be semantic (maps are initialized in most places) but I
think I had an import loop.  Will try.

On Nov 5, 2015, at 4:59 PM, Daniel Smith notifications@github.com wrote:

In pkg/client/unversioned/clientcmd/api/helpers.go
https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/16859#discussion_r44075601:

> @@ -31,6 +31,14 @@ func init() {
>   redactedBytes = []byte(string(sDec))
>  }
> 
> +// IsConfigEmpty returns true if the config is empty.
> +func IsConfigEmpty(config *Config) bool {

reflect.DeepEqual w/ Config{} seems more maintianable?

—
Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub
https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/16859/files#r44075601.

Oh, I see. I figured there was a reason after I wrote that. You have a test
so it's not a big deal.
